itemInfo.itemDesc:
A grain dough baked with meat inside. 

- Unique Effect: Max Stamina +200 for 60 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Sugar
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Pork
item.desc:
A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be used in Cooking.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Butchering a pig corpse.

- Usage: Steak, Meat Stew, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Wheat Dough
item.desc:
A product made by Shaking Wheat Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Olive Oil
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.
